لاوسن جاپان میں دکانوں کے بڑے نیٹ ورک می: Lawson store network size in Japan Lawson expansion in Japan

Company Profile Lawson, Inc. is one of the largest convenience store operators in Japan. As manufacturing retailer based on small commercial areas, the Company had approx. 14,000 stores in Japan and approx. 3,600 overseas stores, as of Feb.
Lawson store network size in Japan Lawson expansion in Japan
TOKYO -- Japanese convenience store chain Lawson aims to increase the number of its overseas stores to 14,000 in the coming six years, mainly in Asia, to equal its current number in Japan.
